words.source: H7760 conj. + Qal perf. 1cs of שִׂים 'to put, set'; KJV 'I will put', ESV 'I will put', NASB 'I will put'
H6304 n.fs pedut 'division, distinction' (or 'redemption'); KJV 'a division', ESV 'redemption', NASB 'a division'
H996 prep. beyn 'between'; KJV 'between', ESV 'between', NASB 'between'
H5971 n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'my people', ESV 'my people', NASB 'My people'
H996 conj. + prep. beyn 'and between'; KJV 'and', ESV 'and', NASB 'and'
H5971 n.ms construct ʿam 'people' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'thy people', ESV 'your people', NASB 'your people'
H4279 prep. l- + n.ms machar 'tomorrow'; KJV 'to morrow', ESV 'tomorrow', NASB 'tomorrow'
H1961 Qal impf. 3ms of הָיָה 'to be'; KJV 'shall be', ESV 'shall be', NASB 'will happen'
H226 art. + n.fs ʾot 'sign'; KJV 'this sign', ESV 'this sign', NASB 'this sign'
H2088 art. + dem. pron. zeh 'this'; KJV 'this', ESV 'this', NASB 'this'
